src: “你们对东校区有很深的误解，那里其实和这里差不多，只是两个校区的管理方式完全不同，他们活在真实的恐怖里，而你们活在虚假的幸福中。”
ref: “You guys have a deep misunderstanding about the eastern campus. It is actually not that different from here, but there are two different administrative styles to the management. The people there live in actual terror, but you guys live in a fake happiness.”
hyp: "You have a deep misunderstanding of the East Campus. In fact, it is similar to here, but the management styles of the two campuses are completely different. They live in real horror, while you live in false happiness."

Zhou Tu hesitated for a moment. Both seniors and teachers had warned freshmen not to approach the East Campus. They did not specify the reasons, but the tone of their speech indicated that the East Campus was very dangerous.

src: 陈歌看着周图的眼睛：“相比较你们，其实他们更加接近希望，因为他们至少知道自己是谁，知道解脱的办法。”
ref: Chen Ge looked into Zhou Tu’s eyes. “Compared to you lot, they are actually closer to hope because at least they know who they are and know how to achieve salvation.”

"You have a deep misunderstanding of the East Campus. In fact, it is similar to here, but the management styles of the two campuses are completely different. They live in real horror, while you live in false happiness."

hyp: "To be honest, I really don't believe that there would be the art studio of my dreams in the East Campus," Zhou Tu said quietly.
new_src_summary: 这段文段描述了一个关于学校两个校区之间的神秘和危险的故事。主要内容是一个人告诉另一个人关于东校区和西校区的区别，东校区的学生更接近希望，而西校区的学生则被困在幕后黑手制作的虚假生活中。通过对学校内部的秘密和真相的揭露，引发了社团成员们的好奇心和兴趣。整体风格神秘、紧张，语气严肃。这段文段探讨了人性、记忆和真相等议题。
new_tgt_summary: In Chapter 805, Chen Ge tells Zhou Tu that the East Campus is similar to the West Campus but with different management styles. Students at the East Campus are closer to hope because they know how to break free from the school's control. The students at the West Campus have their memories altered and live in false happiness. Chen Ge explains that the school treats students as trash and uses various methods to control them. The club members become curious about the truth of the school and consider going to the East Campus.

new_src_summary: 这段文段描述了一个关于学校两个校区之间的神秘和危险的故事。主要内容是一个人告诉另一个人关于东校区和西校区的区别，东校区的学生更接近希望，而西校区的学生则被困在幕后黑手制作的虚假生活中。通过对学校内部的秘密和真相的揭露，引发了社团成员们的好奇心和兴趣。陈歌发现自己的影子变得异常强大，决定利用这个力量寻找厉鬼下手。他带领社团成员前往王一城的宿舍，发现了一些不寻常的情况。王一城显得有些紧张，但最终同意他们进入。在进入王一城的宿舍后，他们发现了一个神秘的现象：东校区和西校区的413寝室存在着相反的情况。整体风格神秘、紧张，充满悬疑的氛围，语气严肃但又不失轻松，探讨了人性、记忆和真相等议题。
new_tgt_summary: In Chapter 805, Chen Ge explains to Zhou Tu that the East Campus, unlike the West Campus, offers students a chance to break free from the school's control and find hope. The school treats students poorly, altering their memories and keeping them in false happiness. The club members become curious about the truth of the school and consider visiting the East Campus. Meanwhile, Chen Ge notices changes in a sleeping dark figure in Room 413 and plans to lead students back to the East Campus to search for a lone ghost to enhance their strength. Despite Wang Yicheng's reluctance, Chen Ge decides to visit his dormitory, suspecting that Wang is hiding something. He warns the club members to keep their activities secret and maintain a low profile.

new_src_summary: 这段文段描述了一个关于学校两个校区之间的神秘和危险的故事。陈歌和社团成员在校园内进行秘密调查，发现东校区和西校区的413寝室存在着相反的情况。在调查过程中，他们发现了一些不寻常的规定和现象，引发了社团成员们的好奇心和兴趣。整体风格神秘、紧张，充满悬疑的氛围，语气严肃但又不失轻松，探讨了人性、记忆和真相等议题。
new_tgt_summary: In Chapter 805, Chen Ge explains to Zhou Tu the oppressive nature of the school, where memories are altered and false happiness is maintained. The club members become curious about the truth and consider visiting the East Campus. Meanwhile, Chen Ge notices changes in a sleeping figure in Room 413 and plans to lead students to the East Campus to search for a lone ghost. Despite Wang Yicheng's reluctance, Chen Ge decides to visit his dormitory, suspecting he is hiding something. He warns the club members to keep their activities secret. Chen Ge is cautious after causing a commotion in the laboratory building and enters a male dormitory on the West Campus. He observes differences between the two campuses and encounters a hostile male student in Room 413, who dislikes Wang Yicheng. Chen Ge notices the student's behavior and sees that Bed 4 is used for storing luggage.

王一城指着四号床，上面扔着几个行李箱，这个寝室里只有他的行李是放在自己床下面的，其他人都把杂物和行李扔到了四号床上。
rel_tgt: Chen Ge acted very naturally and followed the four students into the first building.

Wang Yicheng pointed at Bed 4, where several suitcases were thrown on top. In this dormitory, only his belongings were stored under his bed, while others threw their miscellaneous items and luggage onto Bed 4.
hist_info: "东校区" - "East Campus", "陈歌" - "Chen Ge", "四号床" - "Bed 4"
